Reviews.Title: “Great location and excellent service”
Reviews.Author: sammy_ali_10
Reviews.Content: arrived conte house 9pm greeted smiling fabio friend sights map day followed guidance managed spare time extra useful stay hotel basic facilities tv hairdryer towels breakfast basic toast cheese tomato croissants etc location price tube stop youre termini stops spanish steps trevi fountain vatican city easy bit colosseum 5 minutes walk recommend conte house staying rome service location perfect

Reviews.Title: “A wonderful stay!”
Reviews.Author: KristinH23
Reviews.Content: stayed conte house nights couldnt picked location hotel price owner fabio welcomed immediately definitely pass based likes dislikes told food little money helpful answer close windows properly noise street bath breakfast fine leave hostel hungry colosseum 10 minutes foot main attractions walking distance overall wonderful stay definitely

Reviews.Title: “Great! I can totally recommend this place”
Reviews.Author: wolinek
Reviews.Content: staying 3 nights clean towels free shampoo soap breakfast nice wasnt hungry eating usually low priced hostels location walked termini luggage close colosseum metro stations value money

HotelInfo.Name: Conte House I
HotelInfo.Address: 191 Via Merulana, 00185 Rome, Italy
